root.name: Action Man: Search for Base X
root.description: Overview Action Man: Search for Base X is an action game based on the Action Man franchise. In Action Man the main playable character is Alex Mann, codenamed Action Man. As Action Man the goal is to track down and defeat Dr. X from using his evil weapons of mass d estruction. GameplayJungle Level Action Man has three different difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Action Man features four different environments, each with some unique gameplay mechanics. The different environments are: Jungle, Snow Mountain, Mine, and Ruins. Once the level has been chosen the player then chooses from a variety of different suits and a weapon for the right hand and left hand. Not all of the various suits and guns are available from the start and must be unlocked.
